{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = Compex_WLM54GP26 |wikipedia = |brand = Compex |model = WLM54G |submodelappend = |submodel = P26 |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 09/05/2010 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Compex_WLM54GP26 |sernum = |wlclass = G54 |series = |if = Mini PCI |if_bus_version = |ifconnector = |formfactor = |vendor_id = |device_id = |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = TK4-06-WLM54GP26, TK4-08-WLM54GP26 |icid = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = |chip1 = Atheros;AR2414; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = MMCX |antenna = |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = schematics |802dot11_protocols = bg |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = EoL |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 06/21/2007 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== Two seperate models, one AR2413 based and one AR2414 based, MMCX + U.FL connectors, which are likely separate revisions Schematics are available on the FCC website. {{CompexEoL}} ==Links of Interest== [https://deviwiki.com/files/datasheets/compex/wlm54gp26.pdf Datasheet] ==Notes== ===Revision speculation=== rev1?, specs listed on TK4-06-WLM54GP26 FCC docs (user manual) :;Output power 802.11b, 1-11Mbps, 26 dBm
802.11g, 6-24Mbps, 26 dBm
802.11g, 36Mbps, 25 dBm
802.11g, 48Mbps, 24 dBm
802.11g, 54Mbps, 22 dBm :;Receiver sensitivity 802.11b, -92 dBm @ 1Mbps, -87 dBm @ 11Mbps
802.11g, -90 dBm @ 6Mbps, -70 dBm @ 54Mbps --- rev2?, specs listed on datasheet :;Output power (all +1.0/-1.5 dB) 802.11b, 1-11Mbps, 26 dBm
802.11g, 6-24Mbps, 26 dBm
802.11g, 36Mbps, 25 dBm
802.11g, 48Mbps, 24 dBm
802.11g, 54Mbps, 23 dBm :;Receiver sensitivity (all +-2 dB) 802.11b, -93 dBm @ 1Mbps, -90 dBm @ 11Mbps
802.11g, -93 dBm @ 6Mbps, <-72 dBm @ 54Mbps [[Category:English Documentation]]
